verses.kjv: How amiable are thy tabernacles, O LORD of hosts!
verses.ct: How lovely is your dwelling place, LORD of hosts!

verses.kjv: My soul longeth, yea, even fainteth for the courts of the LORD: my heart and my flesh crieth out for the living God.
verses.ct: My soul longs — it even aches — for the courts of the LORD. My heart and my body cry out for the living God.

verses.kjv: Yea, the sparrow hath found an house, and the swallow a nest for herself, where she may lay her young, even thine altars, O LORD of hosts, my King, and my God.
verses.ct: Even the sparrow has found a home, and the swallow a nest where she can raise her young — right there at your altars, LORD of hosts, my King and my God.

verses.kjv: Blessed are they that dwell in thy house: they will be still praising thee. Selah.
verses.ct: How happy are those who live in your house; they are always praising you. Selah.

verses.kjv: Blessed is the man whose strength is in thee; in whose heart are the ways of them.
verses.ct: How happy are those whose strength comes from you, who have set their hearts on pilgrimage.

verses.kjv: Who passing through the valley of Baca make it a well; the rain also filleth the pools.
verses.ct: As they pass through the dry valley of Baca, they turn it into a place of springs; the early rain covers it with pools.

verses.kjv: They go from strength to strength, every one of them in Zion appeareth before God.
verses.ct: They grow stronger and stronger, until each one appears in God's presence in Zion.

verses.kjv: O LORD God of hosts, hear my prayer: give ear, O God of Jacob. Selah.
verses.ct: LORD God of hosts, hear my prayer; listen, God of Jacob. Selah.

verses.kjv: Behold, O God our shield, and look upon the face of thine anointed.
verses.ct: Look, God our protector, and look with favor on your anointed one.

verses.kjv: For a day in thy courts is better than a thousand. I had rather be a doorkeeper in the house of my God, than to dwell in the tents of wickedness.
verses.ct: A single day in your courts is better than 1,000 anywhere else. I would rather stand at the doorway of my God's house than live comfortably among the wicked.

verses.kjv: For the LORD God is a sun and shield: the LORD will give grace and glory: no good thing will he withhold from them that walk uprightly.
verses.ct: The LORD God is a sun and a shield; the LORD gives grace and glory. He does not hold back anything good from those who live with integrity.

verses.kjv: O LORD of hosts, blessed is the man that trusteth in thee.
verses.ct: LORD of hosts, how happy is the person who trusts in you.
